channel.title: Wilderness Following
channel.description: I am using the Deltascape source, and I found in the internet somewhere a tutorial on making it so when pking, you follow the player as they run away. Well I am having some issues with this, 1 is where when you kill the player you run towards them (They are spawned in lumbridge) 2: If they run away, and you are using range\Mage you get disconnection. Now Can someone please help me, either delete what i put in there, or help me find a fix. Thanks, Dbag :eek:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 17, 2008, 03:38:17 am[/size][hr]BUMP

item.title: Wilderness Following
item.dc:creator: @dbagmandk dbagmandk
item.description:
@dbagmandk wrote:

I am using the Deltascape source, and I found in the internet somewhere a tutorial on making it so when pking, you follow the player as they run away. Well I am having some issues with this, 1 is where when you kill the player you run towards them (They are spawned in lumbridge)
2: If they run away, and you are using range\Mage you get disconnection.
Now Can someone please help me, either delete what i put in there, or help me find a fix.
Thanks,
Dbag :eek:[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 17, 2008, 03:38:17 am[/size][hr]BUMP

Read full topic
